items.sentence: I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t know it was a secret.
I\'m planning to move back to Boston next year.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom has done this before.
I\'ll write Tom a letter as soon as I get home.
I\'m afraid I spilled coffee on the tablecloth.
Don\'t believe everything you hear on the news.
Don\'t blame yourself for what happened to Tom.
I don\'t know the reason why she isn\'t coming.
Thirteen people were killed in the train wreck.
Tom was fast asleep when Mary entered the room.
